hero.title: Welcome to OpenSchool.ai
hero.subtitle: AI-powered platform for modern education
hero.description: Built by teachers for teachers. OpenSchool.ai simplifies your work, automates routine tasks, and helps you focus on what matters most ‚Äî teaching. Your data and your students' data are completely secure.

features.title: Everything for Education in One Place
features.subtitle: Powerful tools for teachers, students, and schools

teachers.title: For Teachers
teachers.description: Reduce routine ‚Äî focus on teaching. Create assignments, track student progress, communicate with parents.

students.title: For Students
students.description: Receive assignments online, track your progress, ask questions to your teacher, and work in a convenient dashboard.

parents.title: For Parents
parents.description: Monitor your child's learning process, receive performance reports, communicate with teachers.

audience.title: Who is OpenSchool.ai for
audience.subtitle: The platform is designed for all participants in the educational process

teachers.title: Teachers
teachers.description: OpenSchool.ai helps manage students, create assignments, check work with AI, and save up to 10 hours per week on routine tasks.

students.title: Students
students.description: Solve problems, get instant hints from the AI assistant, track your progress, and learn at your own pace.

parents.title: Parents
parents.description: Monitor your child's learning process, receive performance reports, stay informed about all assignments and grades.

forSchools.title: For Schools
forSchools.description: Automate the management of the educational process, schedules, and accounting with AI

forDistricts.title: For Districts
forDistricts.description: Centralized education management at the district or city level

cta.title: Ready to Start?
cta.description: Join thousands of teachers already using OpenSchool.ai

quickActions.title: Quick Actions
quickActions.planningDescription: Create schedule and priorities for the day with AI assistant

chat.title: AI Assistant
chat.subtitle: Ask questions about your studies
chat.greeting: Hi! I'm your study assistant. I can help with homework, explain difficult topics, or create an exam preparation plan. How can I help?
chat.processing: I'm processing your request: "{{query}}". This is a demo version, but in a real system I would provide a detailed answer and help on this topic.

assignments.title: Current Assignments
assignments.description: Manage your assignments and track progress

empty.title: No Assignments Found
empty.description: There are no assignments in the selected category

header.title: OpenSchool AI
header.subtitle: AI tools to help you teach more effectively and save your time

lessonPlan.title: Lesson Plan
lessonPlan.description: Create structured, detailed lesson plans tailored to your curriculum and student needs.

difficultyLevel.title: Difficulty Level
difficultyLevel.description: Adjust text complexity to match student reading levels.

textBreakdown.title: Text Breakdown
textBreakdown.description: Break down complex texts into manageable chunks for better student comprehension.

clearInstructions.title: Clear Instructions
clearInstructions.description: Generate concise, actionable instructions for assignments and activities.

exitTicket.title: Exit Ticket
exitTicket.description: Create quick end-of-lesson assessments to check student understanding.

learningGoals.title: Learning Goals
learningGoals.description: Develop clear, measurable learning objectives to guide instruction.

realWorldContext.title: Real World Context
realWorldContext.description: Connect lesson topics to engaging real-life examples.

multipleChoice.title: Multiple Choice Test
multipleChoice.description: Create multiple choice quizzes on various topics.

discussionTopics.title: Discussion Topics
discussionTopics.description: Create engaging topics to spark meaningful classroom discussions.

lessonHook.title: Lesson Hook
lessonHook.description: Plan attention-grabbing lesson starters to engage students.

makeItRelevant.title: Make It Relevant
makeItRelevant.description: Connect lesson content to student lives and interests for increased engagement.

profile.title: Teacher Profile
profile.name: Name
profile.subject: Subject
profile.disciplinesNote: Disciplines are assigned by school administrator
profile.emailChangeNote: Email can only be changed by administrator

students.title: Student Management
students.name: Name
students.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this student?
students.changeFilters: Change filters or add new students
students.multiSelectHint: Hold Ctrl to select multiple groups

groups.title: Group Management
groups.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this group?

invite.title: Invite Student
invite.description: Send this code to the student. After logging in, the student can enter the code and automatically connect to you as their teacher.
invite.validityWarning: Code is valid for 7 days. After student connection, the code will become invalid.

chat.placeholder: Ask OpenSchool AI, how can I help

placeholders.progress: What's the progress of students in mathematics?
placeholders.lessonPlan: Help me create a lesson plan on derivatives...
placeholders.testResults: Analyze the results of the last test...

chat.welcome: Hello! How can I help you?
chat.selectFromList: Select a conversation from the list on the left
chat.error: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again.

help.title: Help
help.welcomeText: We're here to help you effectively use our AI tools for teaching.
help.noAnswer: If you didn't find the answer to your question, contact support

questions.addStudent: How do I add a new student?
questions.addStudentAnswer: Go to 'Student Management' ‚Üí click 'Add Student' ‚Üí fill out the form and save.
questions.lessonPlan: How do I create a lesson plan?
questions.lessonPlanAnswer: Select the 'Lesson Plan' tool on the main page ‚Üí specify topic and parameters ‚Üí AI will create the plan automatically.
questions.exportDataAnswer: The export feature will be available in upcoming updates. Data is currently stored in the system.
questions.changePassword: How do I change my password?
questions.changePasswordAnswer: Password change feature is in development and will be available in upcoming updates.
questions.statistics: Where can I view student statistics?
questions.statisticsAnswer: Open the 'Statistics' section in the profile menu to view detailed analytics.

actions.createLessonPlanDesc: Quickly create a structured lesson plan with AI
actions.addStudentDesc: Add a new student to the system

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.peakActivityText: 3:00 PM‚Äì5:00 PM - most active student time
analytics.recommendationText: Add more weekend tasks to increase activity

settings.title: Settings
settings.newTasksNotifDesc: Receive notifications when students complete tasks
settings.autoSaveDesc: Save lesson plans and tasks automatically
settings.changePasswordDesc: Update your password for better security
settings.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to logout?
settings.featureComingSoon: Theme change will be available in upcoming updates
settings.passwordComingSoon: Password change will be available in upcoming updates

aiChat.title: Parent AI Assistant
aiChat.greeting: Hello! I'm the OpenSchool AI assistant. Ready to answer any questions about your child - {{childName}}.
aiChat.placeholder: Ask a question about your child...

status.title: {{childName}} is doing well!
status.performanceText: Average grade {{grade}} - that's an excellent result!
status.recommendation: I recommend paying attention to mathematics - there's room for improvement.

grades.title: Recent Grades
grades.activity: Teachers note activity in history and language classes!

remarks.title: Remarks for
remarks.summary: Overall behavior is good, remarks are minor!

meeting.title: Upcoming Events
meeting.reminder: Reminder will come 2 days in advance!

help.title: Study Recommendations
help.physicsDifficulty: Physics - difficulties with formulas (recommend a tutor)

schedule.title: Schedule for Tomorrow
schedule.reminder: Don't forget math and physics textbooks!

unknown.noInfo: Unfortunately, I don't have specific information on this question for {{childName}}.
unknown.contact: Or contact the homeroom teacher by phone: {{phone}}

questions.status: How is my child doing at school?
questions.grades: What grades did they get this week?
questions.remarks: Are there any remarks from teachers?

profileModal.title: My Profile
profileModal.addChildMessage: The ability to add a child will be available after database integration. The school administrator should link you with the student via email.

teacherChatModal.placeholder: Write a message to the teacher...

sampleMessages.teacher1: Good afternoon! Your daughter is having some difficulties with a new algebra topic. I recommend additional lessons.
sampleMessages.parent1: Hello! Thank you for the information. Can you tell me more about which topics are causing difficulties?
sampleMessages.teacher2: Quadratic equations. I suggest meeting on Thursday after classes for consultation.
sampleMessages.teacherResponse: Thank you for your message! I'll get back to you soon.

welcome.title: Welcome to OpenSchool.ai!
welcome.description: Let's quickly get acquainted with our platform. It will only take a minute!

features.title: Platform Features
features.description: OpenSchool.ai is a comprehensive educational platform with AI assistants for teachers, students, and parents.

getStarted.title: Start Right Now
getStarted.description:
"Start Free" - self registration
"Via School" - registration with school code

hasAccount.title: Already Have an Account?
hasAccount.description: If you are already registered, click "Login" to access your dashboard.

welcome.title: Welcome to the Student Dashboard!
welcome.description: Let's explore the main features. You can always return to this tour through settings.

navigation.title: Section Navigation
navigation.description:
Here are all the main sections:
Dashboard - overview of your progress
AI Chat - ask questions to the assistant
Schedule - your lessons
Journal - grades and attendance
Planning - learning plan
Assignments - homework

dashboard.title: Dashboard - Main Page
dashboard.description: Here you see overall statistics: average grade, progress by subject, and upcoming assignments.

chat.title: AI Assistant Chat
chat.description: Ask questions about homework, request explanations for difficult topics, or ask for help with problems.

assignments.title: Assignments
assignments.description: View all your homework assignments, submit completed work, and receive feedback from your teacher.

energy.title: Energy
energy.description: Each question to the AI assistant consumes energy. Energy restores daily or you can get unlimited with a Pro subscription.

profile.title: Profile and Settings
profile.description: Here you can change profile settings, view achievements, and manage your subscription.

welcome.title: Welcome to the Teacher Dashboard!
welcome.description: Let's explore the tools. You can always return to this tour through settings.

categories.title: Tool Categories
categories.description:
All tools are organized by categories:
Planning - lesson plans, learning objectives
Creation - tests, questions, materials
Support - student assistance
Teaching - discussions, assessments
Students - student management

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Here are all AI tools for work: assignment generation, work checking, test creation, and much more.

search.title: Tool Search
search.description: Use search to quickly find the tool you need among dozens available.

students.title: Student Management
students.description: In the "Students" tab, you can manage your student list, view their progress, and communicate with them.

discipline.title: Discipline Selection
discipline.description: Switch between disciplines to work with different subjects and student groups.

profile.title: Teacher Profile
profile.description: Manage profile settings, view statistics, and configure notifications.

welcome.title: Welcome to the Parent Dashboard!
welcome.description: Let's explore the features. You can always return to this tour through settings.

childSelector.title: Child Selector
childSelector.description: If you have multiple children, switch between them here.

quickStats.title: Quick Stats
quickStats.description: Here you see overall statistics of the selected child's performance: average grade, attendance, and activity.

teacherList.title: Teacher List
teacherList.description: List of all your child's teachers. Click on a teacher to open a chat with them.

aiChat.title: AI Assistant Chat
aiChat.description: Ask questions about your child's performance, get learning recommendations, and help with homework.

quickQuestions.title: Quick Questions
quickQuestions.description: Ready-made questions for quick information: progress, attendance, homework.
